backend/main.mo: Defines types and in-memory lists for contact submissions and network applications, with APIs to submit, fetch all, and fetch by email.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers plus OKLCH variable theme tokens for light and dark mode with global background and border settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Services, About, Join Network, and Contact, wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/site/PortfolioPr: Displays a six-item portfolio grid with grayscale thumbnails and hover-reveal titles and categories.
frontend/src/components/site/PrimaryButt: Wrapper around shadcn Button providing custom primary and secondary variants with consistent sizing and typography.
Footer with brand info, nationwide messaging, social links, and Caffeine attribution.
Sticky header with desktop and mobile navigation using TanStack Router for active link highlighting.
Layout component rendering SiteHeader, Outlet content, and SiteFooter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and identity persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks that fetch contact submissions and network applications using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and global typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the company’s vision, systems, and national presence.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form that submits inquiries through the backend actor and shows a success message on completion.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page with a hero section, national network overview, and navigation to key actions.
frontend/src/pages/JoinNetworkPage.tsx: A page that displays a join-the-network application form, handles form state and submission via an actor, and shows a success message after submission.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: A services overview page defining six service offerings with icons, descriptions, and features, rendered within a styled layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, animations, containers, and theme settings with custom variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the marketing site’s goals, design requirements, required assets, and implemented features.
